tool_description: This is the official Crickbuzz API for live score matches, upcoming matches, previous matches, player info, series info, and much more.  #For a better understanding mail me at vis.sarvaiya@gmail.com#
name: Crickbuzz Official APIs
title: Crickbuzz Official APIs

api_list.name: Ranking Team
api_list.description:
/rankings/allrounders?formatType=odi
/rankings/allrounders?formatType=odi&women=1 [For women Ranking]
formatType is as below:
- odi
- test
- t20

api_list.name: Ranking Bowlers
api_list.description:
/rankings/bowlers?formatType=odi
/rankings/bowlers?formatType=odi&women=1 [For women Ranking]
formatType is as below:
- odi
- test
- t20

api_list.name: Ranking Batsman
api_list.description:
/rankings/batsman?formatType=odi
/rankings/batsman?formatType=odi&women=1 [For women Ranking]
formatType is as below:
- odi
- test
- t20

api_list.name: Venue Stats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crickbuzz-official-apis.p.rapidapi.com/venue/51/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crickbuzz-official-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crickbuzz-official-apis.p.rapidapi.com/venue/{venueid}/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crickbuzz-official-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News
Series Stats
api_list.description:
/series/{seriesID}/stats
/series/{seriesID}/stats?statType=mostRuns

Get series stats like most runs, most wickets and so on
You can get statType value from /series/{seriesID}/stats this end point

api_list.name: Match Highlights
api_list.description:
/match/{matchID}/highlights?inning=1&highLightType=1

Get match highlights data like fours, sixes, wickets and more
Highlight type is as below

- 1   = Others
- 2   = Fours
- 4   = Sixes
- 8   = Wickets
- 16  = Fifties
- 32  = Hundreds
- 128 = Dropped Catches
- 512 = UDRS

required_parameters.name: highLightType
required_parameters.description:
1   = Others
2   = Fours
4   = Sixes
8   = Wickets
16  = Fifties
32  = Hundreds
128 = Dropped Catches
512 = UDRS
